title: My Account is On NA when it should be on EUW.
body: So Im trying to log into my account on EUW but I can't so I try to see why and I find out that my account has been moved to NA and I really need help, because I can't play in NA, and would really like it back in EUW, and I don't have the money to buy a transfer, so I read up on it, and apparently you guys can help me get it moved back! Please help.

replies.body: This account was transferred from EUW to NA about 2 years ago. If you weren't the one who transferred it please hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that our account recovery experts can take a look and help out if a hacker or something did this without your knowledge or permission.
